pullRequest.title: Quote all identifiers for generated Cassandra query
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixes #2449
Only alphanumeric and underscore are allowed as the identifier in Cassandra.
I guess we can quote all identifiers without the current conditions, but I added this logic to minimize the diff.

nodes.bodyText: Please maybe extract a separate commit like "Retain actual names in CassandraInsertTableHandle"
This would belong to "Retain actual names in CassandraInsertTableHandle" if you extract it

In the description you wrote

Only alphanumeric and underscore are allowed as the identifier in Cassandra.

but the logic here is different.
Did you mean something like
if (!identifier.matches("[a-z]([a-z0-9_]*[a-z0-9])?") {
    return quoteIdentifier(identifier);
}

this would not only impl want you describe (quote everything that contains non-underscore, non-alphanumeric characters), but also

quote names starting with digit (i'm just guessing this isn't legal either)
quote empty names (eliminating existing check at the beginning of validColumnName method)
quote non-lowercase names (eliminating existing check at the beginning of validIdentifier method)

(of course, such Pattern should be compiled as static field)

commit.message: Quote all identifiers for generated Cassandra query

afterCommit.message: Quote all identifiers for generated Cassandra query
